review_text: This is my second time to your properties. And I enjoyed myself very much. It was clean well maintained just what I’m looking for in an Airbnb.
Super clean and nice. Perfect place to stay for someone visiting the area alone or as a couple!
Always love staying here when I come to visit!
Nice clean space right around the corner from our family.
My wife and I stayed for 3 days as a getaway! Truly enjoyed it, was a great stay. Immaculately clean. Perfect for couples.
Such a lovely place, we felt right at home. We will be back for sure :)

This lovely Airbnb is reflective of the wonderful hosts. The decor and layout is well thought out and cozy as can be when away from home. Hosts have thought of everything from cleaning supplies to even a spacious closet and laundry accommodations in the apartment. It is in a safe area and is in a great location to so many spots in Campbellsville and surrounding areas. I’ll definitely rebook when in town. Thank you for the hospitality!
Stayed for a month and I couldn’t have felt more at home. Everything was perfect. 10/10

Booked this place last minute, knowing nothing of the area, and I'm glad I did! The place was private and quiet, and the interior was beautifully decorated. I especially appreciated the little touches, such as water bottles in the fridge and basket of snacks. If I ever needed to return to Columbia, you can bet this would be the first place I'm checking!

A beautiful location in the Kentucky countryside! Compact, comfortable, equipped with all you would need. Very responsive hosts who graciously accommodated my requests for both early check in and later checkout. I could not have wanted for a better place to stay.
Always a great time when I come to visit my daughter at this location. Absolutely love it.
Would definitely refer my friends to this Airb&b. Very clean and close to Green River. Quiet and Private.Jason and Sharon respond to any needs quickly
Always a pleasure to stay here when visiting Campbellsville!
Always a pleasure staying here! I will definitely be spending summers here when I need to visit my daughter.
Overall, a 10. Very nice Inside. I needed a place to stay. For one night and they got ahold of me within 20 minutes. I would recommend this place to anybody.
This was our second stay. We really enjoyed our time. And appreciated our hosts. Very welcoming and cozy. We will definitely come again!
Nice updates, thoughtful decor, SUPER clean. Lots of little extras.
Super clean and comfortable. Loved the back porch. Bed was great, snacks, coffee and condiments were available. Excellent stay

Sharon and Jason are great hosts. They're kind, available, fair, and keep their properties clean and neat. There doesn't seem to be many rental options in Campbellsville, so many thanks to these folks for being ahead of the game.
All the right touches added to make you feel comfortable and right at home!
Very nice space to stay. Well equipped with daily necessities. I would highly recommend!!
We enjoyed our stay very much! Super hosts in my opinion!
The accommodation offered is very pleasant and well furnished. Access is easy and close to the city. We highly recommend.
I had a very nice stay! Try had everything I needed and the place was so cute and clean!
Clean, comfortable and convenient. Sharon and Jason’s property provided well-needed respite while my husband and I were in town for a death in the family.
It was a very nice place, smelt nice
The place was very clean, updated, and adorable. Everything looked just like the pictures. The snacks and waters left for us was such a treat! I would recommend to others visiting the area!
Prefect place for students traveling for rotations!
This is our go to place when we visit Campbellsville. Sharon and Jason have always been great to work with and the home is perfect for my family.
Perfect place to relax and close to everything. Everything needed to feel at home was there. Hosts were great

We loved your space. It was truly beautiful, quiet, clean, convenient and affordable. This space had everything we need. Thank you for your hospitality.
Love, Elizabeth and Erick!
It was wonderful,,very clean and the communication was very prompt. Thanks for the snacks and waters.
Very clean and nice. Decorated very cute. Great communication would definitely recommend to anyone.
Really easy and great spot to stay- thank you all!
Great place to stay!!! Special touches make it very homey!!! Highly recommend!!!!
i had such a great experience!! beautiful place and so clean!
Awesome place!
Beautiful accommodations! Treats & hot beverages. Bathroom upstairs next to the bedroom. Highly recommend this site. Enjoyed visiting Green River Lake.
GraceLand was amazing! This was the second time staying and I really enjoyed spending time with my daughter here. Having delivery options so close by for groceries and eating out was convenient!
Great place, great people, great location.
Sweet little apartment—so clean and welcoming. The decor was beautiful and the layout was incredibly functional. So close to town and the lake! Loved our stay and will definitely stay again.

Very nice, clean apartment. Nice to have the snacks and bottled water upon arrival. Very quiet. They were great host. Answers any questions very quickly. Me and my wife were there over a month with no problems.
We would definitely recommend this Property.
The place was very well organized and clean. Communication was prompt and with a fair price ! Would certainly stay there again and recommend it!

Great placeas expected. Quite neighbourhood. Cleanliness as expected.
i will definitely recommend this place to my family and friends
Awesome place to relax and feel safe and comfortable. Have recommended this little slice of Heaven to our extended family and friends when they come to visit!!!
Super cute clean apartment with lots of thoughtful extras!
Wonderful place to stay
You will come back. 5 stars all the way!
I actually booked this for a guest who was visiting so I never saw the place myself but she had only good things to say about it!
This rental is well-stocked and just lovely. The neighborhood seems very quiet (we only stayed one night), which is very relaxing. Jason and Sharon have thought of all the nicest touches!
This apartment was exactly as portrayed on the site. It was very clean, well stocked, and well equipped. I’ve already recommended it to others.
Immaculate place! Clean, new, and well equipped!

My wife and I cannot say enough about Sharon and Jason’s home. It was absolutely perfect. Extremely clean and well stocked. We were visiting family in the area so we spent most of our time away from their home but if it we were looking to just get away it would have been the perfect spot to do so. They thought of everything. Had we wanted to prepare a meal, everything we would have needed would have been there. Did I mention how clean their home was? The neighborhood was quiet and serene, very peaceful. We’re looking forward to our next visit to Kentucky and I can assure you our next visit will be planned around Sharon and Jason’s home availability.

Best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in! They have thought of everything, from the snacks, additional tv in the bedroom, plentiful Keurig options, and even bottled water in the fridge! The home was beautiful, and very cozy. The bed was even cozier! I wish I had more trips coming up, so I could stay there again!
Place was great and just like the photos

This little place is a true gem. So welcoming….it’s so clean, the air conditioning was perfect after a day on the lake. Everything you may need is there waiting. Don’t even wonder…just book this place. It is awesome!
Nice apartment with country views. Very comfortable bed. Loved the porch. Bathroom is on the upstairs level. Just a little confusing to find by GPS. Would book again when in town visiting family.
Had a nice time. Very cute apartment.
Great place to stay for a lake trip, only a five minute drive. Easy access and clean and had everything we needed! Highly recommend!
Great place! Sharon and Jason have added so many special touches that make you feel at home! First time we had done an Airbnb. Great experience! Thanks again for a great stay in Campbellsville!
Nice place to stay
Great stay!
Great place to stay if your are going to Green River…

Sharon and Jason are great! The accommodations are always spot on.
Clean, comfortable, convenient.
Highly recommend.
This is a great central location for different Kentucky day trips! It’s also really nice to have a washer and dryer after a few days of hiking. A lovely stay.
This is an excellent place to stay! Very clean and comfortable! Excellent location! Great host! Great value!
Great place to stay for a long weekend to get away!

We had a great experience, plenty of room for us and our teenage son! Next time we will be bringing a football or frisbee to toss in the side yard. The place was so clean and so cute! We felt at home and had a cozy stay. The TV in the bedroom was a great surprise!
Great for two adults or trow adults and a couple of kids. Supper clean and very nice.. will stay there again...
I recommend it

Sharon and Jason did a great job renovating the apartment. They had everything we needed which included water, snacks, cleaning supplies and toiletries. The place was very clean and looked exactly like the pictures. It’s definitely a hidden gem. Thanks again for the comfortable stay.
beautiful place with everything you need :) 10/10 would recommend
A delightful little space with much charm.
Great place! Had a great stay. Everything was clean and the space was super cute! Only drawback was that the shower didn’t have much water pressure, but other than that everything was wonderful!!!
Thank you!
Nice clean apartment. Convenient location. Highly recommended.
Clean, nicely renovated, comfortable, great location, easy checkin and checkout. Looking forward to my next stay. Highly recommended.

I felt so at home staying at Graceland. Sharon and Jason really did a fantastic job with all the small touches. The bottle water and snacks were a huge help and cozying up by the fire really rested me from all my travels. The holiday decorations brought a huge smile to my face too! Loved staying and can’t wait to return again. Thank you!
Loved it
Cute place. And very clean with many nice touches. Loved the stay!
Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Would definitely stay here again!
This is the second stay I have had with Sharon and Jason. Their apartments are so clean and well equipped. There provide so many special touches for your stay.

Such a beautiful and comfortable place to be away from home and very, very clean. Sharon was very helpful and quick to respond as this was our first experience with an Airbnb. I highly recommend if looking for a place I. The area.

Grace Land felt like home away from home! We stayed for a week and were very comfortable in this cute apartment. Everything was very clean and in great condition. The apartment complex was quiet, the king bed was very comfortable, and the washer/dryer was a nice bonus. The location was great too... just a few minutes drive from stores, restaurants, and the state park. We hope to return in the future!

Great cozy & quiet apartment. Super close to the lake and near plenty to do. Loved the coffee bar and my kids loved the snack basket. Would recommend to anyone needing to stay in the area. Thank you again.
Loved this place!

This was a super cute apartment that is a stunner as soon as you open the door. Really beautiful decor and everything is top notch inside. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and that's a big deal for us when we stay in various places. Overall great value and we wish we had time on our trip to stay more than just 1 night. Oh, and the provided snacks and water were especially appreciated since we arrived late and couldn't get dinner ahead of time.
Sharon and Jason’s B&B is a wonderful little place to visit.
I traveled to the area with my mom and we were blown away by Sharon & Jason's place! We wished we had built in more time to enjoy it longer!
Another great stay. Will be back. Very clean, nice amenities, thoughtful touches.
My girlfriend and I had a wonderful stay! Sharon and Jason are great hosts. The apartment was perfect for us and we especially appreciated the small touches.
Great apartment! Close to CU campus and host had little touches to make us feel at home.
Great rental! Thank you for being awesome hosts. We will stay again!
Charming, clean apartment in a prime location between the lake and Campbellsville. Thank you for a great stay!
Sparkling clean. Have stayed in one of their other units before and will be back again!
Not much on the outside, but don’t judge a book by its cover. The inside was unique, sparkling clean, and comfy. Similar price to a hotel in the area. This is much cleaner and quiet too.
Nice on the inside. Clean on the outside
Great place. Definitely recommend
Great place to stay! Clean with great personal touches!
This place was a stunning place to spend time when we got rained out of our other plans. The place was sparkling clean, and the hosts thought of everything.
This little apartment was so cute, very clean, and the snacks were just a generous bonus! The bed is super comfortable as well. Would definitely recommend and hope to come back one day!

Graceland airbnb is an excellent choice! The place is very modern looking and is in a great location. You are sure to fall in love with it the second you walk in. Amenities provided are excellent. It's close to the lake as well as eating areas, and close to the main street. Sharon and Jason were great at communicating and accomodating our stay with an earlier check in time and grace time to check out. If we decide to visit again, this will most certainly be a top choice. You will not be dissapointed.

Graceland was amazing. I came to visit my daughter, along with her godmother, and this apartment was spectacular. I think the person that enjoyed it the most was my 3 year old daughter. Graceland is cozy, complete with washer and dryer + the king sized bed felt like sleeping on clouds.
I love the location because it’s close to Downtown Campbellsville. It was very convenient for the trip. Having a little back porch was great for sunrises and watching my child play with rocks.
Would definitely return to this location for my next trip.
The apparent was clean and stylish. Perfect for a getaway for 2!

Graceland is a perfect place to stay when visiting Campbellsville and/or surrounding areas. The apartment is newly renovated with lovely decor and all kinds of thoughtful touches. It’s very clean and all the appliances are new, so it really feels like being at home. There are other apartments in the same block and 3 more blocks nearby so if you wish to be somewhere really secluded then this is not the place for you, but the neighbours didn’t bother us at all (no noise or anything). We loved seeing the deer out back in the mornings & evenings! We can wholeheartedly recommend staying here, and will definitely stay here again next time we’re in Campbellsville :-)
Just as advertised. You’ll love it.
Excellent! Felt like a suite in a 5 Star hotel.
Excellent stay! Clean, easy to find, beautiful and wonderful home.

S&J’s house was as previously reviewed and described. Clean, stylish and comfortable. The Green River Lake is 5-7 minutes away and Campbellsville is 5 min in other direction. Plenty of choices to eat out and 2 Krogers only a couple miles apart. Not sure why.
Place was so cute and modern! Very clean.

Small apartment very close to green lake river and other amenities! Pleasantly surprised on how cute and amazing this apartment was! Smelled so good and clean and the perfect touches to make the place feel like home! Great size bed and had everything you’d need!
We love it. 2nd time staying here, always great!!
Excellent unit . Great hosts .
It's an amazing apartment. Sooooo nice, just remodeled. Way better than any hotel. Really quite place, peaceful and relaxing. All the little touches are amazing. From snacks, to water.
The property is very convenient as far as location, it’s more than a comfortable stay, they really go the extra step. Great hosts, highly recommended.
Great place and a great price! Sharon and Jason’s place was extremely clean and exactly what I was hoping for.

Grace Land exceeded my expectations; and by far. It’s really cozy, has a full and pleasant list of instructions, and it’s honestly attractive. They did well with the light design touches and it all just makes this a place I want to come back to.
We walked in and were legitimately wowed. I’d say give this more than just a fair look in your lodging search. Choose this.

Such a great experience! This was such a cozy space and we just really enjoyed our stay. I loved walking in after being on the road to a basket full of snacks, an assortment of coffee and a fridge stocked with water. Very very clean inside and the bed was comfortable as well. Five stars for sure!!
A very clean and modern apartment with great amenities.
Very clean and stylish. Amenities were great.

Very nice apartment. The location was just right for us and all the little extras were
appreciated.

I have been to many Airbnb’s and this may have been my best experience. Sharon and Jason were Johnny on the spot to respond. Their interiors were immaculate and full of special treats. There is no doubt I would return if I am up that way again.
Great space and convenient location with easy travel locally.
Such a very cute space, clean, bed is super comfortable, and their personal touches were such a pleasure!

Highly recommend Grace Land! The place was just as it looks in the pictures. It was very nice, neat and clean. Love all the little extra thoughts, snacks and cold water. Super place to stay if you are in the area.
Comfortable and clean. Relaxing space.

This property is perfect. If you are staying in the area or any where close to it, this is the only place to go to. The place was very clean and they had great small touches that made you feel right at home.
Great communication. The place is spectacular, I felt at home with a variety of amenities to use! I would definitely recommend staying here again!
Always a great stay!
Brand new apartment on the inside which was set up great. Lovely hospitality with good coffee and thoughtful treats. Worked out great for us.

This place is absolutely stunning! All high-end finishes and completely spotless! Check in was a breeze. A simple text and a code gets you into the house. Once you’re in you have a fully furnished condo with a washer and dryer WITH laundry detergent, a full kitchen (including ALL cooking utensils) WITH a Keurig for morning coffee along WITH a variety of coffee to choose from, bottle water in the fridge, not to mention a variety of snacks! The TV’s, cable, Netflix, WiFi, etc., is all spot on! There is a nice big TV in the living room and a nice cozy spot to watch tv in the bedroom as well. Cable, Netflix, and WiFi is all provided. If you forget your toothpaste, deodorant, soap, etc., don’t worry, they got that covered too!!!! These guys do an excellent job at what they do and their condo is 100% gorgeous and most importantly to me, it was clean!!!!! I can’t say it enough. It was spotless clean! I’m on the road about three quarters of the year due to work and the night I stayed here was the closest I’ve felt to being in my own home in years! Lastly, I’ll mention that I am an OCD clean freak. This place was perfect! Thank you Sharon and Jason!
P.s. I forgot to mention, but the king size bed is really comfy as well!!! Job well done!
Super nice place! Will use again when in the area!
A very spectacular place!

Sharon and Jason’s apartment was perfect for a weekend getaway. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. The cozy apartment was perfect for 2 but could easily be a perfect fit for a company of 4 as well. Sharon and Jason were great hosts and very quick to respond when and if we needed anything. We will definitely be returning soon!
Sharon and Jason’s place was so pleasant and lovely. Even with two small kids it was perfect. Definitely stay here!
Tastefully decorated. The kitchen was well equipped. very clean and beautiful with a surrounding trees

Great Cabin for our trip. We had 3 couples and we felt very comfortable. Within a Hour to most of the distilleries on the bourbon trail. We also went to Keeneland HorseTrack, about 1.5 hours away. Nice hot tub and gas grill on the back decks.
Would definitely stay here again.
we had a great stay in the cabin for our softball tournament would stay again for sure.

Beautiful cabin, quiet, loved sitting in the hottub! We were in town visiting for a wedding so it was nice to have all the cabins close together. Went into town one of the days, not much nightlife there so be prepared for that. I would say bring board games, books, and other things to occupy your time if you’re going to be there more than two days. Wish this cabin had a fire pit like the other one… would have been nice to sit by the fire in the evening.
We had a great time in your beautiful rental. Thank you!

This was a beautiful place to stay. The cabin was new and furnishings were new. Everything was very clean and it was well stocked. The beds were super comfy. Elam’s communication was clear and good instructions. It was secluded but only 10 minute drive from shops and restaurants. Would highly recommend staying here.
What a peaceful location and extremely modern cabin! Loved our stay! Just 10 minutes from great restaurants!

The house was very nice, beautiful location and a very nice, open floor plan. The furniture was really cool in the lounging areas and the house was clean. My only disappointment and I knew this going in, so I really shouldn’t hold it against the house … the bed sizes. With such a beautiful home and so much going for it, having king beds would push this house over the top. The queens are okay, but I would not go back based on my addiction to having a roomy sleeping area. I’m not a supersized person, but do like to sprawl out and sleep better with some room. King beds and I go back and rate 10 stars!

I highly recommend the cottage Que Administra Elam . My family and I had a great time looking for a place to rest and this cabin met our expectations a quiet place the cabin with everything needed very clean decorated overall everything perfect . Thank you Elam, excellent host 🙏
The cabin was as expected and was clean when we arrived. The only issues was that we had no cell service and the wifi was extremely slow, but other than that we had a great stay!

The cabin was peaceful and enjoyable. The house was clean and the kitchen had a handful of items we were able to use. I wish the poor WiFi connection was mentioned before we booked or got to the house since we had issues using it at night when we were relaxing at the house. Overall, Elam was easy to work with and the cabin worked out for our stay.

We loved our stay! It was the perfect spot for a quiet and low key bachelorette party. It was also super close to downtown restaurants. The hot tub was a huge perk and we loved it! The cabin itself was clean and comfortable. Plenty of space for the 7 of us. Elam was also very understanding and accommodating and responded very quickly which was greatly appreciated. It was a super cute cabin and someplace that is definitely worth another trip when it is warmer so the area around the cabin can be enjoyed as well!
Beautiful cabin in the woods near Green River. No rear neighbors! No traffic! A serene & beautiful getaway for anyone looking to take a break!
It couldn’t have been better !
Very beautiful house. So so peaceful & relaxing! Thank you for allowing use to use your home.
We celebrated new years at cabin #5 and it was incredible! Even though it is in a row of cabins it still felt private and secluded on the back decks/ in the hot tub. We had a great time!

The cabin was absolutely beautiful and like new— 10/10. It’s even prettier than in the pictures. We loved the cozy fireplace and stunning firebox. All smart TVs in every room were a hit with the kids! The WiFi reception was great in our experience. It’s very nice how every sleeping space is gorgeous— in other cabins there’s only one nice bedroom and the others are spartan. Not the case here. We had a very pleasant and easy experience renting this cabin from start to finish ❤️
Elam was amazing! We had two things happen and both were fixed within 15 minutes. Quick and friendly responses with easy solutions!
This is our second time coming here, and this time we brought our friends! It was beautiful and a wonderful experience ☺️
it was a very nice home and well put together everyone enjoyed it and made a lot of compliments. thank you

Cabin 5 was exactly what we hoped it would be. The decor was gorgeous, the home was spacious, the hot tub was glorious, and the scenery was breathtaking. We cherished valuable time a family, cooked a fabulous Thanksgiving dinner in the beautifully appointed kitchen, and slept late in the comfortable beds.
Beautiful cabin, all about family.

My booking was very last minute maybe 2 hours prior to check-in. I was using the space for a dinner for my father’s birthday then we all stayed the evening. We cooked in the kitchen and served 8 guest, made breakfast the following day and never wanted/needed something that wasn’t there. Everything went like a story book. The cabin in the woods was very clean, and was perfect for my family! Elam was extremely responsive and really made it an easy experience. I WILL RENT AGAIN. It was a few dollars more than my budget but once I arrived and seen the cabin I knew it was money well spent! 🤌🏼
We had a great time staying here without issue. The location was great and my family absolutely loved it.
Great stay! Peaceful and the little extra touches where great!

We really enjoyed our stay at this cabin! We have already booked it again for during the holidays! A couple of things I would have liked to know before I came
1. It's not as private as we thought. It is one of 4 cabins on the same stretch. You can see other people's cars and lights from their cabins when you go out. (Not a big deal, but I thought it was alone in the woods.)
2. The kitchen is Completely stocked! I had all the cookware I needed for all the baking I did, and I did alot! Also it had grill tools, and coffee, and paper towels, trash bags, laundry detergent, and really everything we needed to have a great stay!
3. The sewer did seem to have an issue everyday we were there, in that when we walked outside, there was a very strong sewer smell. This was not pleasant. Also the front door had the handle coming loose, and when we checked it, it was missing a screw. This was a safety concern for us, but I'm sure they'll fix it.
All in all, we were very happy with our stay!!!
We had an amazing stay & the host was super responsive!
Pictures do not do this justice. Cabin is beautiful. Very clean & had everything we needed for a weekend stay. Very peaceful surroundings.

The cabin was beautiful, comfortable and very clean. Great amenities, but did miss the fire pit (which will be great once finished)
It was a 5-7 min drive to town, which had options for groceries, restaurants, gas, etc.
The kitchen had enough supplies for indoor and outdoor cooking
We loved the spacious back deck with wooded views and a distant peak of the water.
Beautiful cabin with plenty of space for a big family (we were 6 adults plus 1 toddler). We especially loved how comfy the beds were and the fact that every bedroom had a separate bathroom!
This is our third time staying at the cabin. And we will be back again next season. Very convenient.

Beautiful cabin in the woods. Very comfortable. Once they get the internet upgraded, it will make this excellent cabin spectacular.
Kind, responsive hosts.
Beautiful cabin! We had a wonderful time.

Elam’s place was AMAZING! such a beautiful property and cabin, especially for the price. So many great amenities included too. Would definitely recommend for an outdoorsy getaway! Elam was very responsive too, when we were having trouble with the lock he called almost immediately. Really appreciate his responsiveness!

Thank you fir a fantastic stay! Beautiful place and, although very steep, the hike behind the cabin was amazing! Even with little rainfall, the waterfall was still trickling and pretty. the cabin was very clean and the decorations felt like home! Elam offered suggestions when we asked and responded so quick! Thank you!!
We really enjoyed our stay at the cabin and plan to return in the spring with our boys. Such a beautiful, peaceful place- will recommend to all our family and friends!

do not hesitate to book from Elam! this was a beautiful cabin,well appointed and decorated. it was less than a mile from a marina and multiple boat ramps making it a great place for anyone looking to spend time at the lake. Elam was a wonderful host and had thought of everything!
We had stayed once before and loved it, so we knew we needed to go back. Had another wonderful weekend there. We have one more trip planned this summer and we are staying again. 10/10 recommend!

Beautiful home in a great location. Everything we needed was provided in the kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, etc. a fantastic rental and the hosts were so responsive and helpful! Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Would definitely stay here again for a peaceful get away.
Had a wonderful stay! House was perfect for what we needed. Got to spend a great week with family.
Although we hit a deer totaling our vehicle the Airbnb provided a source of comfort and feelings of home. The pictures do no justice
We would go back in a heartbeat! Can’t wait to stay again. It was so clean, plenty of room for everyone too. You won’t go wrong with staying here.

Place was fantastic. Just as described. However, if you are going to fish and have a boat behind your vehicle, this location is hard to get in and out of. The turn around in front of the house is too narrow to turn around with trailer and the easiest way is to back down the long drive from the main road.
The place wasjust as described, myself and the family had a great getaway. There is nothing negative to say about the trip. Thanks
This may have been the cleanest BnB we’ve ever stayed in! The cabin was SO nice. We would love to come back again!

Place is secluded and very quiet. Looks and smell new. Climate control worked great . It was very clean. Would have like to have more hooks or selves in the bedrooms or bathroom to hang or just put our language on and not on the floor. Since we only stayed one night and had to leave we never got the chance to explore the surrounding nature has to offer on a long walk. Plenty of space to move around. We would love to come back for a longer stay and would recommend it to friends and family. Thanks for your hospitality.

We had a wonderful stay. The cabin is spacious and very nice. We were in town for our youngest daughter's wedding and our other children and granchildren joined us at the cabin. We had planty of room for everyone. We loved that we all had our own bedroom and bathroom. It worked well for our large family. We will definitely stay here again if we the have the opportunity.
Great place to stay. Definetly would do again!!
Perfect weekend get away from my fiancés birthday! We enjoyed the hot tub with 2 of our friends and it was so peaceful! The cabin was everything we wanted and more. Absolutely perfect hosts as well!
This cabin is like brand new. Amazing spot, so peaceful and quiet at the end of a dirt road in the woods. Hot Tub!
Great place!
Privet and cozy. Greatly enjoyed my stay.
Awesome views, 2 minutes from the lake. Very spacious, will definitely stay again!

We had a great time at the Dreamin big family Escape. The location was secluded and beautiful at the end of a road right on the edge of a creek feeding down to the lake. It had all the amenities we wanted and more. Everything is new and fresh making it easy to settle in and enjoy. The instructions were easy and the host was really responsive.
The location is nice with the lake and marina a couple minutes away with shopping and the town also 10-15 minutes away.
we loved the house and view . would definitely come back again
Absolutely loved the stay!
A seriously beautiful place to stay! The cabin is comfortable and has all the amenities. The hot tub on the deck looking at the lake and the woods was my favorite spot! Enjoy!
Always responsive, comfy house! Would stay again.
The house was as described, clean and perfect for a quick little family gathering. Kellen communicated as needed. Zero complaints.

Kellen’s place was fantastic. Listen up tournament fishermen….the is a great place to lodge while fishing a tournament on Green River Lake. Very spacious 3 bedroom two n half bath. You will not be disappointed. And Kellen is very responsive and helpful. Highly recommend this gem near Campbellsville KY.
Kellen was very responsive with any questions I had and was very polite. I will definitely rent this place again!
We had a good stay for a weekend. The host was quick to respond and keep us updated with check in and check out and was flexible! Very neat house
GREAT SPACE AND LOCATION
We enjoyed our stay. Flexible check in and check out.
I would stay here again!
Nice place!!!! Would Re-book again.
Great stay! Clean, cozy and convenient! Would recommend to everyone! Kellen was great!
We love staying here. It’s the perfect size for my family :)

Exceeded expectations. Kellen went above and beyond to ensure our stay was wonderful. The house was spacious, decorated very cute, and smelled so fresh and clean! I loved the view of the sunrise! Gorgeous both mornings. Would highly recommend!
It was a great place to stay.
Beautiful place will definitely stay again!The house was very clean and it also had some great views of the land. We absolutely loved it and enjoyed our time!

The house was just what we needed. Plenty of space for our family of six.
We enjoyed the firepit, the TVs in each bedroom and all the space to spread out.
The bathrooms were large, splenty of seating in the common area and nice outdoor space.
